title: DESIGN.md — depkit
text: depkit build-time HTML asset dependency manager R. manages CSS JavaScript assets produced R tooling (notably htmlwidgets) provides deterministic, usage-agnostic way : deduplicate assets, preserve first-seen ordering, copy local assets target directory, optionally apply verified CDN logic JavaScript, emit HTML snippets (<link>, <script>) callers insert documents constructing. depkit write HTML files, track emitted, impose document layout policy.

title: DESIGN.md — depkit
text: Track CSS JS assets ordered unique sets Deduplicate dependencies name@version Copy local assets configured output directory Optionally verify emit CDN-backed JavaScript fallback newly added assets, known assets (ordered, deduped)

title: DESIGN.md — depkit
text: Write complete HTML documents Track whether assets emitted Decide snippets belong document Maintain “prepared” “emitted” state Integrate site generators (Hugo, etc.)

title: DESIGN.md — depkit
text: dependency uniquely identified : key used registry deduplication.

title: DESIGN.md — depkit
text: asset uniquely identified : rel_path stylesheet script path declared dependency. Asset ids : - stable - output-agnostic - sole unit tracked dependency manager URL resolution filesystem paths derived later.

title: DESIGN.md — depkit
text: depkit two public classes one internal representation.

title: DESIGN.md — depkit
code: classDiagram   class DependencyManager {     <<S4>>     +registry: named list<html_dependency>     +css_assets: character     +js_assets: character     +config: list      +insert(x) InsertUpdate     +emit_css(keys=NULL) character     +emit_js(keys=NULL) character     +has(key) logical     +remove(key) DependencyManager     +names() character     +length() integer   }      class InsertUpdate {     <<S4>>     +dm: DependencyManager     +added_css: character     +added_js: character      +dm() DependencyManager     +is_empty() logical     +emit_css() character     +emit_js() character     +insert(x) InsertUpdate   }    InsertUpdate --> DependencyManager : dm   DependencyManager --> InsertUpdate : insert()

title: DESIGN.md — depkit
text: DependencyManager (DM) holds persistent state depkit: dependency registry (deduped dep_key) ordered unique CSS asset ids ordered unique JS asset ids configuration (Option )

title: DESIGN.md — depkit
text: Configuration stored DM applies uniformly: output_root — filesystem directory copied assets url_root — URL prefix used emitted tags cdn — logical; automatic CDN resolution via jsDelivr (JavaScript ) Configuration affects copying emission, stateful sense “prepared” “emitted”.

title: DESIGN.md — depkit
text: InsertUpdate higher-level API object : captures “changed” insertion delegates emission back DM reduces caller reasoning burden plumbing introduces new capability.

title: DESIGN.md — depkit
text: Insertion functional: Normalize input (html_dependency, htmlwidget, list) Resolve dependencies assets asset ids Compare asset ids DM’s ordered sets

title: DESIGN.md — depkit
text: new asset ids discovered files copied Return InsertUpdate empty added_css / added_js DM returned unchanged

title: DESIGN.md — depkit
text: Extend DM’s ordered sets new asset ids Copy local asset files new assets overwriting allowed skipping identical files preferred optional Return InsertUpdate containing newly added asset ids

title: DESIGN.md — depkit
text: DM never tracks whether assets emitted prepared. tracks assets exist, order.

title: DESIGN.md — depkit
text: Emits snippets newly added assets Implemented calling DM emission keys = added_asset_ids mutate DM InsertUpdate

title: DESIGN.md — depkit
text: Emits assets given type Preserves first-seen order deduplication logic required emit time

title: DESIGN.md — depkit
text: depkit constructs ephemeral asset records internally : insertion (copying) emission (tag generation) records stored part public API.

title: DESIGN.md — depkit
text: internal asset record contains: Common: asset_id kind (css / js) dep_key rel_path src_dir out_path url JavaScript (cdn = TRUE): cdn_url (optional, resolved automatically via jsDelivr) integrity (sha384, SRI hash) fallback_url Records derived deterministically : DM state configuration filesystem inspection

title: DESIGN.md — depkit
text: Always local-Emitted :

title: DESIGN.md — depkit
text: cdn = FALSE Emit local <script src="URL"></script> cdn = TRUE insert time, query jsDelivr API npm package matching dependency name version Hash-match local JS files jsDelivr’s file listing matched: match error: silently emit local-

title: DESIGN.md — depkit
text: Example: “emit CSS encountered, JS end” depkit enables policy enforce .
code: flowchart TD   A["Start: dm"] --> B["insert(dm, widget1) -> u1"]   B --> C["emit_css(u1)"]   C --> D["dm1 = dm(u1)"]   D --> E["insert(dm1, widget2) -> u2"]   E --> F["emit_css(u2)"]   F --> G["dm2 = dm(u2)"]   G --> H["End of document"]   H --> I["emit_js(dm2)"]

title: DESIGN.md — depkit
text: Malformed dependencies → hard error Asset copy failure → hard error CDN verification failure → warning + local fallback Network failures never fatal depkit always fails closed local assets.

title: DESIGN.md — depkit
text: Avoid probing--correctness Use explicit class checks; fail fast Keep porcelain thin S4 orchestrates; logic lives utilities Determinism cleverness Preserve insertion order; implicit sorting hidden state “prepared”, “emitted”, “already handled” flags

title: DESIGN.md — depkit
text: depkit provides clean, deterministic boundary: DependencyManager — canonical asset state InsertUpdate — explicit delta + ergonomic emission Insert — may copy new assets Emit — returns HTML snippets, nothing Callers decide snippets go. depkit decides snippets .

title: Getting started with depkit
text: DependencyManager needs output directory copied assets URL prefix emitted tags. correspond build pipeline’s static asset directory ’s served.
code: library(depkit) #>  #> Attaching package: 'depkit' #> The following object is masked from 'package:base': #>  #>     remove  dm <- DependencyManager(   output_root = tempfile("assets"),   url_root = "/static" ) dm #> <DependencyManager> with 0 registered dependencies:

title: Getting started with depkit
text: insert() accepts html_dependency objects, htmlwidgets, lists either. returns InsertUpdate — delta records newly added. Use dm() extract updated manager subsequent inserts:
code: # Create two sample dependencies (standing in for real widget deps) src1 <- tempfile("dep1") dir.create(src1) writeLines("body { margin: 0; }", file.path(src1, "reset.css")) writeLines("console.log('app');", file.path(src1, "app.js"))  src2 <- tempfile("dep2") dir.create(src2) writeLines("console.log('utils');", file.path(src2, "utils.js"))  dep1 <- htmltools::htmlDependency(   "my-app", "1.0", src = c(file = src1),   stylesheet = "reset.css", script = "app.js" ) dep2 <- htmltools::htmlDependency(   "my-utils", "0.5", src = c(file = src2),   script = "utils.js" )  u <- insert(dm, dep1) u #> <InsertUpdate> added 1 CSS, 1 JS assets dm <- dm(u) u <- insert(dm, dep2) dm <- dm(u) dm #> <DependencyManager> with 2 registered dependencies: #>   my-app@1.0, my-utils@0.5

title: Getting started with depkit
text: Inserting dependency -op. key property makes depkit useful — multiple widgets can declare overlapping dependencies depkit ensures registered exactly .

title: Getting started with depkit
text: emit_css() emit_js() generate HTML snippets. Called manager, emit tags registered assets. Called InsertUpdate, emit tags newly added.
code: # All registered CSS cat(emit_css(dm), sep = "\n") #> <link rel="stylesheet" href="/static/my-app-1.0/reset.css">  # All registered JS cat(emit_js(dm), sep = "\n") #> <script src="/static/my-app-1.0/app.js"></script> #> <script src="/static/my-utils-0.5/utils.js"></script>

title: Getting started with depkit
code: has(dm, "my-app@1.0") #> [1] TRUE names(dm) #> [1] "my-app@1.0"   "my-utils@0.5" length(dm) #> [1] 2 dm_reduced <- remove(dm, "my-utils@0.5") names(dm_reduced) #> [1] "my-app@1.0"

what: Using depkit in a build pipeline
title: Getting started with depkit
text: API designed called page builder function, interactively. ’s sketch site generator might use depkit process list widgets page: CSS goes <head>, JS goes end <body>. Shared dependencies (dep1 dep2 declared ) appear .
code:
build_page <- function(widgets, output_dir) {   dm <- DependencyManager(     output_root = file.path(output_dir, "assets"),     url_root = "/assets"   )    head_css <- character()    for (w in widgets) {     u <- insert(dm, w)     head_css <- c(head_css, emit_css(u))     dm <- dm(u)   }    footer_js <- emit_js(dm)    list(head_css = head_css, footer_js = footer_js) }  # Example: two widgets with overlapping dependencies result <- build_page(list(dep1, dep2), tempfile("site")) cat("<!-- <head> -->
") #> <!-- <head> --> cat(result$head_css, sep = "
") #> <link rel="stylesheet" href="/assets/my-app-1.0/reset.css"> cat("
<!-- end of <body> -->
") #>  #> <!-- end of <body> --> cat(result$footer_js, sep = "
") #> <script src="/assets/my-app-1.0/app.js"></script> #> <script src="/assets/my-utils-0.5/utils.js"></script>

title: Getting started with depkit
text: Set cdn = TRUE automatically resolve JavaScript assets jsDelivr. depkit hashes local JS file looks match jsDelivr package listing. found, emitted <script> tag uses CDN URL subresource integrity local fallback: best-effort: failure (network error, 404, hash mismatch) silently falls back local-tag. configuration CDN URLs required.
code: <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/pkg@1.0/dist/lib.min.js"         integrity="sha384-..."         crossorigin="anonymous"         onerror="this.onerror=null;this.src='/assets/pkg-1.0/lib.min.js';"> </script> dm <- DependencyManager(   output_root = "public/assets",   url_root = "/assets",   cdn = TRUE )

code: @Manual{,   title = {depkit: Build-Time HTML Dependency Kit},   author = {Andrew Stryker},   year = {2026},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://andrewjstryker.github.io/depkit}, }

title: depkit
text: depkit build-time plumbing R packages generate static HTML pages containing htmlwidgets. manages CSS JavaScript dependencies widgets carry — deduplicating shared libraries, copying files output directory, emitting production-quality HTML tags.

title: depkit
text: htmltools provides renderDependencies() copyDependencyToDir(), handle dependency rendering file copying. work well inside Shiny R Markdown, runtime manages full document lifecycle. static site generation — blog engines, custom document pipelines, Hugo post-processing — requirements different: depkit accepts html_dependency objects htmlwidgets htmltools . ’s narrow package handles one concern — asset management static HTML — produces <script> tags CDN URLs, SRI integrity, local fallback htmltools mechanism generate.

title: depkit
text: depkit designed plumbing site generators document pipelines. ’s sketch page builder might use : widget’s dependencies deduplicated automatically. Shared libraries like jQuery registered emitted , regardless many widgets use .
code: build_page <- function(widgets, output_dir) {   dm <- depkit::DependencyManager(     output_root = file.path(output_dir, "assets"),     url_root = "/assets",     cdn = TRUE   )    body_html <- character()   head_css <- character()    for (w in widgets) {     u <- depkit::insert(dm, w)     head_css <- c(head_css, depkit::emit_css(u))     body_html <- c(body_html, render_widget_html(w))     dm <- depkit::dm(u)   }    footer_js <- depkit::emit_js(dm)    # Assemble the page — depkit provides the snippets, you decide the layout   write_html(output_dir, head_css = head_css,              body = body_html, footer_js = footer_js) }

title: depkit
text: cdn = TRUE, depkit checks JS file jsDelivr hash. match found, emitted tag uses CDN URL subresource integrity local fallback: configuration CDN URLs required. failure — network error, 404, hash mismatch — silently falls back local-tag.

title: depkit
text: MIT

title: Construct a DependencyManager — DependencyManager
text: Creates new dependency manager tracks HTML dependencies, deduplicates assets, copies files output directory, emits deterministic HTML tags. Use insert() register dependencies emit_css()/emit_js() generate corresponding HTML.

title: Construct a DependencyManager — DependencyManager
code: DependencyManager(   registry = list(),   output_root = NULL,   url_root = NULL,   cdn = FALSE )

title: Construct a DependencyManager — DependencyManager
text: registry Optional list html_dependency objects pre-register. output_root Filesystem root copied assets. url_root Base URL emitted assets. cdn Logical; enable automatic CDN resolution via jsDelivr (FALSE default). TRUE, JS assets checked jsDelivr hash emitted CDN URLs, SRI integrity, local fallback.

title: Construct a DependencyManager — DependencyManager
text: dependency_manager object.

title: Construct a DependencyManager — DependencyManager
code: dm <- DependencyManager(   output_root = tempfile("assets"),   url_root = "/static" ) dep <- htmltools::htmlDependency(   "example", "1.0",   src = c(file = system.file(package = "htmltools")),   script = NULL ) upd <- insert(dm, dep) dm(upd) #> <DependencyManager> with 1 registered dependency: #>   example@1.0

title: Emit CSS link tags — emit_css

title: Emit JS script tags — emit_js
text: Generates <script> HTML tags registered JavaScript assets. CDN enabled (cdn = TRUE), tags include integrity crossorigin attributes local fallback.

title: Emit JS script tags — emit_js
text: Character vector HTML <script> tags, one per JS asset.

title: Check whether dependencies are registered — has

title: Insert dependencies — insert
text: Registers new dependencies manager, copies asset files output directory, records CSS/JS asset ids later emission. Dependencies already registered silently skipped.

title: Insert dependencies — insert
text: x dependency_manager insert_update. dep html_dependency, htmlwidget, list.

title: Insert dependencies — insert
text: insert_update object containing updated dependency manager vectors newly added CSS JS asset ids.
